CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Blend from holding position outside the trench (0) to full trench dive (1).
CONTROLS.NAME: intro_position

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Scale the number of incoming green lasers.
CONTROLS.NAME: laser_density

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Multiply overall flight speed of the trench run.
CONTROLS.NAME: flight_speed

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Controls how narrow the in-focus band is for the tilt-shift effect.
CONTROLS.NAME: tilt_narrowness

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Strength of the miniature tilt-shift look (0 disables).
CONTROLS.NAME: tilt_strength
